EN.name: Li Ying

EN.education: Graduated in 2018 with a Ph.D. in Cognitive Neuroscience from the University of Chinese Academy of Sciences (Institute of Psychology, Chinese Academy of Sciences). Mentored by Academician of the European Academy of Sciences and Arts, and distinguished young scholar, Chen Chuqiao.
